name: multi-judge-consensus
description: Implement multiple LLM judges with consensus voting in evaluation systems
author: ProjectScylla Team
use_cases: Adding multi-judge support to evaluation systems
Implementing consensus voting across LLM evaluators
Designing per-judge reporting with aggregate results
Creating flexible CLI arguments with shortcuts
key_patterns: Simple average + majority vote for consensus
Sequential judge execution to avoid rate limits
argparse nargs='?' for optional argument values
Backward compatibility in load() method for field renames
anti_patterns: Placing optional dataclass fields before required fields
Over-engineering consensus algorithms before measuring need
Parallel judge execution without rate limit handling
Forgetting backward compatibility when renaming persisted fields
